Episode.GuestStars: |Chazz Menendez|Chinaza Uche|Coy Stewart|Donna Murphy|Dorothy Lyman|Fiona Dourif|Jacinto Taras Riddick|Javier Molina|Katie McCarty|Larry Bryggman|Luis da Silva, Jr.|Matthew Stadelmann|Mike Boland|Mike Keller|Ricky Garcia|Rob Torres|
Episode.Overview: Red acclimates to his new surroundings in federal prison, where he is challenged by an old rival. Samar goes undercover to stop a black market organization that fronts cash to criminals. Liz and Jennifer continue their investigation into Red's past.
